item.title: Jenkins on Azure Kubernetes Cluster (AKS) - How to recover Jenkins controller from Azure availability zone or region failure
item.description: Table of contents Setting up our environment Create VNet and AKS with NGINX Ingress Controller Create Managed Disk and Configure Jenkins Storage Deploy and configure Jenkins Test Availability Zone failover Test Regional Failover Final Thoughts Jenkins is still a very popular CI/CD tool used by a lot of companies if you want to run it in Azure there are some usual options to choose from including stand alone VM’s or Azure Virtual Machine Scale Sets, but in this article, we will use AKS for both Jenkins controller and agents.
